item.title: AGENT: A Benchmark for Core Psychological Reasoning
item.description:
In this seminar, I talk about the recently released paper “AGENT: A Benchmark for Core Psychological Reasoning.

item.title: SAILenv: Learning in Virtual VisualEnvironments Made Simple
SAILenv
item.description:
SAILenv is a Virtual Environment powered by Unity3D. It includes 3 pre-built scenes with full pixel-wise annotations. SAILenv is capable of generating frames at real-time speed, complete with pixel-wise annotations, optical flow and depth.

SAILenv also comes with a Python API, designed to easily integrate with the most common learning frameworks available.

SAILenv is a running project at SAILab. More information is available at the project page. Source code and executables are also available there.
